p: MERS: ( TITLE-ABS-KEY ( ( ( "Middle east respiratory syndrome" OR "MERS") AND ( coronavirus)) OR ( "MERS-Cov" OR "MERS virus" OR "MERS disease" OR "Middle east respiratory syndrome virus" OR "Middle east respiratory syndrome disease")) AND NOT TITLE-ABS-KEY ( ( "nCov" OR "Covid-19" OR "covid19" OR "SARS-Cov" OR "SARS-Cov-2" OR "SARS" OR "Severe acute respiratory syndrome"))) AND PUBYEAR > 2011.
